attributes.action: Stop the relocation of the Royal Photography Society's collection from Bradford.
attributes.background: We must do everything possible to ensure that the Royal Photography Society's collection remains at the National Media Museum in Bradford. If this collection were to be removed to the V&A this would be terrible and be a cultural travisty for Bradford and the North of England.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This decision is the responsibility of the Science Museum Group, which is operationally independent.
